trans-unit.source: Expose <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> types to UI Automation.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> class.
An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" /> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
"RibbonGallery" in all cases.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

The text that describes the functionality of the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for each child element that is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
